thread.title: Kodak Black Challenges Lil Wayne to a Fight
thread.title_full: Kodak Black Challenges Lil Wayne to a Fight

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Kodak Black Challenges Lil Wayne to a Fight
text:
The forthcoming Soulja Boy and Chris Brown bout may not be the only fight to look forward too. Kodak Black has recently challenged Lil Wayne to a fight in the ring. On Monday night, Kodak Black took to Instagram to share his video challenge, saying: "Tell Lil Wayne, fight me. We finna get in the ring, we finna fight. Me and Lil Wayne. I'm finna knock that stupid ass n*gga out." 
It's not exactly certain why Kodak is so determined to get at Weezy, but Wayne's comments about know knowing who the Project Baby is in 2016 likely triggered this. If Wayne wins the fight, Kodak will give the Louisiana rapper the title of "best rapper alive." He shares: "If he whoop me, he the best rapper alive."
The video has now been deleted.
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
